page.title: 15QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content:
95% of the people interviewed were very happy living here,whilst over 75% fo them worked within the survey area. However,of the newer inhabitants more than 60% of them travelled to the surrounding district for their jobs,largely in Grimsby 16 kms.north.
35% of the population had been born within 8 kms. of where they now live, which would show that they must be contented with the area.
Only 15% were regular visitors to either of the churches,although this figure was higher amongst children, many of whom went regularly to Sunday school each week.There are no other places of worship other than C of E, or Methodist chapel,the few Catholic families travelling to Grimsby to worship.
